paper_abstract: This article presents a web-based educational module developed to promote limestone contactor technology to design engineers, state and federal regulatory agencies, and small water system utilities that typically deal with corrosion control problems. The module is interactive and rich in photos and diagrams. ((c) 2005 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 13: 240-249, 2005; Published online in Wiley InterScience (www.interscience.wiley.com); DOI 10.1002/cae.20047
paper_title: A web-based educational module on limestone contactors technology for drinking water professionals
